body:
The author really do be retconning AHAHAHAHA. Extended succubus universe.

So this took place right after Tiny Evil 5. Poor sensei got jebaited into this… 4 took place around the same time. 2 and 3 are their own thing. 1 took place right after this at night when Miyu went to meet the suicidal guy.

Talk about a confusing timeline.

It’s a bummer these retcons made the wholesome story of the first one a lot less wholesome… especially showcasing how many dicks Miyu sucked
Another great work from Muk, creator of the certified loli classic doujin series "Tiny Evil".
All this cumming making me crave cum
Everyday we stray further from God

@fakboyaki Beauty. That aside, art style is pretty good, the three lolis looks like they're characters that are simply drawn to look good. Without actual story and that's not a bad thing. A pretty solid one ngl, maybe worth a 10/10, simply and straight with enough context for the story
